name: Currency One USD
description: Currency One USD (C1USD) is a USD-pegged stablecoin issued by Kinesis Money Panama S.A. (“Kinesis Panama”). Every C1USD is backed by a 1:1 asset reserve. Kinesis Money Panama S.A. is the entity responsible for its issuance and management within the Kinesis ecosystem. C1USD is the first asset in the Currency One Suite of single-currency stablecoins.
